H0.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Rocky

H1.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Sparky

H2.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Rex

H3.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Dino

A4.text: Dino ( ) is a fictional character featured in the Hanna-Barbera animated television series The Flintstones, and its spin-offs and feature films.

A5.text: He is a pet dinosaur of the series' main characters, Fred and Wilma Flintstone.
